original_text: And he began to speak unto them by parables. A certain man planted a vineyard, and set an hedge about it, and digged a place for the winefat, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country.
korean_text: 예수께서 비유로 그들에게 말씀하시되 한 사람이 포도원을 만들어 산울타리로 두르고 즙 짜는 틀을 만들고 망대를 지어서 농부들에게 세로 주고 타국에 갔더니

sentences.original_text: And he began to speak unto them by parables.
A certain man planted a vineyard,
and set an hedge about it,
and digged a place for winefat,
and let it out to husbandmen,
and went into a far country.
